[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575620193226{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/pexels-photo-140983.jpeg?id=1002) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”About NanoSoft” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:2.875rem|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_custom_heading text=”NanoSoft has pioneered IT services in New York for 30 years, consistently delivering business value with the latest technology.” font_container=”tag:div|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id=”sidebar-5b6cfa681b024″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1536635902854{margin-bottom: 60px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInLeft” width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-xs-6″][vc_single_image image=”145″ img_size=”1000×852″ style=”vc_box_rounded” css_animation=”none”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInRight” width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-xs-6″][vc_single_image image=”146″ img_size=”1000×400″ style=”vc_box_rounded” css_animation=”none”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_single_image image=”143″ img_size=”1000×400″ style=”vc_box_rounded” css_animation=”none”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Technology solutions to help businesses and societies flourish” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

NanoSoft is a privately owned IT Support and IT Services business formed in 1988. Today we’re proud to boast a strong team of IT engineers who thrive on rolling up their sleeves and solving your IT problems and meeting your business needs. We are on a mission to exceed your expectations and form a long-term, mutually beneficial relationship with you.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Download Our Brochure

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”gradient2 fix-overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1575620693004{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/3″ el_class=”delay-1″]

What We Do

Technology can be complicated, but we’ve seen it all before and can help you with any IT issue.

View Our Services
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/3″ el_class=”delay-2″]

Who We Help?

Our vertical solutions expertise allows your business to streamline workflow, and increase productivity.

Industries We Serve
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/3″ el_class=”delay-3″]

Why Choose Us

We have a proven process to help you move your business forward and we’re with you every step of the way.

Find Out More
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1575620213308{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #181223 !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our History” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1575620221889{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”1988 – 1990″ font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.5em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]NanoSoft begins life as the networking division of ThemeForest. ThemeForest is a software company that was formed in November 1988 following a management buyout of LineThemes.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1534133353803{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”2000 – 2009″ font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.5em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]NanoSoft launches as an independent business. NanoSoft moves into our New York offices. Those offices became home for the next 20 years as the business continued to grow from strength to strength.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1534133362720{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”2010 – 2017″ font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.5em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]NanoSoft successfully partners with Envato, a growing provider of local Australia IT Support and IT Services to both local and overseas businesses.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1534133373185{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”2018 – Present” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.5em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]The service team at NanoSoft made it through to the final of the Service Desk Industry (SDI) Best Small Managed Service Desk Provider (MSP) awards. We are incredibly proud of the external recognition for our team, who have completed extensive training and have worked incredibly hard over an extended period to ensure we consistently meet the needs of our customers.ers with CComm IT Solutions, a UK provider of outsourced IT Services.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Outreach by the Numbers” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/5″ el_class=”delay-1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-6″]

0+

Experts across a range of specializations
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/5″ el_class=”delay-2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-6″]

0

Episerver Certified Developers
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/5″ el_class=”delay-3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-6″]

0

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/5″ el_class=”delay-4″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-6″]

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”1/5″ el_class=”delay-5″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-6″]
